learning_objective: Model daily processes by creating and following algorithms (sets of step-by-step instructions) to complete tasks.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is wanting to learn a new skill each month. The skills range from learning a musical instrument to mastering a cooking technique. Write the steps Alex could follow to learn a new skill each month.",
    "Answer1": "Alex chooses a skill and leaves it for the month.",
    "Answer2": "Alex picks a skill and practices it only when they feels like it.",
    "Answer3": "Alex randomly picks a skill every day and tries to learn it.",
    "Answer4": "Alex picks a skill at the start of the month, sets regular practice times, seeks out resources to help them learn, gets a mentor if possible, and reviews their progress at the end of the month.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "An algorithm is a step-by-step series of instructions. This timeline offers a way Alex can effectively master a new skill every month."
}
